name: Madvent Calender 3 Necrosis
description:
It's becoming too powerful...
Lost in an ocean of dark isolation, her voice beckons to you once more.
The comforting black ink dissolves, and you bathe in the blinding glow of unnatural lights.
Your sight returns, and you are drifting in the bay of bustling city.
Many towers scrape the sky, but one pierces right through it.
The glass ball atop its point resonates with the same energy that religious symbol held.
In New Spook City a sickness shall spread.
Collect 24 dreams before they're all dead.

name: Spark Era
description: Spark Era is an immersive 3D battle royale mobile game that takes place in a futuristic, post-apocalyptic world where the humanity faction from Earth are fighting for survival while competing against other three factions. The game is set in a galactic environment and features both PvP gameplay. Players can team up with other players, and ultimately battle their ways in the harsh conditions of the universe.

name: Advendows Calendar OS 2022
description:
This is an escape room type game, disguised as an advent calendar, made in a couple of gruesome nights for my wife.

You have to click through 24 different "apps" on a virtual desktop, play some games and solve some puzzles to escape the Desktop Dimension and celebrate a peaceful christmas.

name: RNG & Yuri
description:
6 rather unique women have gathered at a speed dating event dubbed RNG and YURI aimed toward women who want to find a female partner. At the start of the game, you will choose to play as one of them and then attempt to woo the other 5 girls in a short amount of time. The goal is to receive at least one phone number.

Love is unpredictable and you never know what comments will land and which might offend your date when you're just getting to know them. To represent this your success hinges on RNG (Random Number Generation). Depending on your luck you may get a few numbers or none. That isn't to say no strategy is required. Knowing when to say some things and reserve some comments for later can also help you gain affection. This system favors being choosy and not trying to get every girls' number.

name: Quest Hunter: Deluxe Edition
description:
Quest Hunter is an isometric action-RPG where your choice drives the story. Find tons of treasures and secrets, solve puzzles, equip your character, level up your skills and finish off enemy bosses. Play on the couch, alone or with friends, or make it an online party for up to four players!

Strangewood is a story addition to Quest Hunter. Explore new locations, fight with new enemies, solve puzzles with new mechanics. Level up new skills and get new weapons and equipment.

name: The Game of Life 2: Deluxe Life Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Tribals.io
description: A survival game with building, crafting, territorial competition of players on an open world environment, and it runs on the browser.

name: Bitmates
description: Welcome to the world of Bitmates. A massively multiplayer online role-playing game where monkeys rule the lands. Explore, gather resources, and interact with other players in this vastly diverse world.

name: Arcade Archives: Tetris the Grand Master
description:
Arcade Archives: Tetris The Grand Master is a puzzle game released by Arika in 1998.
Test yourself against players around the globe! This version features a rank certification system that analyzes your speed, accuracy, and technique to rank players into 19 skill levels!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: NSW 81 Class SRA Pack
description: Build between 1982 and 1991 to replace the 1950s vintage 42 and 44 class locomotives these locomotives operated over most of NSW, and to Melbourne and Brisbane. This pack features the brightly painted Candy and Bicentennial livery units, with multiple weathering options, and other scripted features.

name: Gerald "Jerry" Lawson's 82nd Birthday
description: Today’s interactive game Doodle celebrates the 82nd birthday of Gerald “Jerry” Lawson, one of the fathers of modern gaming who led the team that developed the first home video gaming system with interchangeable game cartridges. The Doodle features games designed by three American guest artists and game designers: Davionne Gooden, Lauren Brown, and Momo Pixel.

name: Lost in Memory
description: You play as a girl who has shut herself in her home and refuses to leave. she must explore and find her memories if she ever wants to escape her past. This game is inspired by Yume nikki and various classic RPG Maker horror games.

name: I Commissioned Some Bees Advent
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy Christmas/winter world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 25 art pieces to choose from, and 2500+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Nekketsu Kouha Kunio-kun Gaiden: River City Girls 1-2
description: Both River City Girls games bundled together.

name: Pokémon Go: Mythical Wishes
description: The 9th season of Pokémon Go, "Mythical Wishes", is themed by the myth of granting wishes. It will introduce the Pokémon GO Tour 2023: Hoenn, selectable bonuses from Timed Research tasks, new Pokémon and new battle leagues.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Room Without Doors
description:
You wake up in a strange room.
Can you solve the tricks and riddles
and escape fromThe room without doors?

name: Zombie Shooting Star: Arcade
description: You become a beautiful combatant Rudy. On the planet XX full of mutants and zombies. Defeat zombies and mutants, find and destroy Mutant Core before it regains power!

name: Awaken
description: In Awaken, a punk world that combines 2D and 3D, the protagonist wakes up unexpectedly. On the way to escape, he shuttles among various forces in the world to complete various tasks. This is an action adventure game with RPG elements, full of surprises, waiting for you to explore and discover.

name: Falsepine
description: Join a long lineage of Hunters as you run and gun through the wild west in this action rogue-like. Take on Bounties, Unlock powerful weapons and come face-to-face with a gallery of terrifying monsters.

name: Missing Pictures: Catherine Hardwicke
description: For every movie made, dozens of pictures remain missing forever. In the VR documentary experience Missing Pictures: Catherine Hardwicke, the American filmmaker tells how she unsuccessfully tried to adapt the cult book "The Monkey Wrench Gang", a precursor to eco-activism.

name: Winter
description: Winter - is an adveture third person game in medieval setting with intense gameplay and exciting combat system which allows you to use different combo moves, tricks and special atacks. Along the way, you will meet creatures that will challenge you to fight and try to get your power. Follow your destiny, let the story tell you about how the first snow fell.

name: Fur Squadron
description: Fur Squadron is an arcade space shooter on rails, which follows the adventure of a team of elite pilots during what seems at first a routine training in virtual reality.

name: Sword of the Vagrant
description:
Guide Vivian the Vagrant, through vibrant and dynamic landscapes while hacking and slashing a path from a quiet coastal village through mysterious forests, haunted castles, and wrecked battlegrounds. When the endless barrage of enemies have been vanquished, what solace will be left for our hero?
"Journey into a gorgeous hand-painted fantasy world known as Mythrilia and discover the truth about your bloodline and its darkest secret. Hack and slash a path from a quiet coastal village through mysterious forests, haunted castles, and wrecked battlegrounds. When the endless barrage of enemies have been vanquished, what solace will be left for our hero?

The Vagrant is a 2D action RPG. As Vivian, you will experience an exciting and challenging adventure focused on combat gameplay that utilizes combo chains, charge attacks, and special skills, all while improving your character's build through new equipment and abilities. Play casually or become a master combatant.

name: Super Planet Life
description: Being a planet in space can be very lonely, but fortunately there is life out there. Search the corners of the universe for new friends, who will help you on your quest to become a happy little place to live. Manage your resources, upgrade tools, and fight through jerk-infested dungeons to advance.

name: Cyber Bodies
description: Gather your willpower and investigate the truth about your past in a harsh and gloomy cyberpunk-style world. Take a closer look at others - who knows what goals they pursue and why they need you. Have fun, kill, fuck and uncover the main secrets of your bodies! Who knows what awaits you…

name: Salvation of the soul
description: Salvation of the soul is a first person game. You need to perform a ritual to save the soul of the girl, while not being killed.

name: International Basketball Manager 23
description: Become the basketball manager of the moment and leave your mark by leading your own dynasty. Control all the management tools that International Basketball Manager 23 puts at your fingertips to take your team to the top. Manager, your time has come!

name: CRAP
description: A Card Multiplay Auto Battler. Choose your Hero. Select a Supporter and start searching for an enemy. Choose wisely between Artefacts, Statcards and Weapons to win against your oponent. Win the Best of 3 and get Rankpoints ;)

name: Cat N Can
description: This is the Card cross over Puzzle Game, You are the cat goint to find a can. The Card is define the way you walk. In the way to find you will meet many animal, some will help you some will scare you. Everything in the map are reactable, use everything on map and card to help the cat find can!

name: Dorm Days
description: Dorm Days is a casual, RPG, dating sim. This indie game takes you into the life of a college student.

name: Furry Arena
description: Furry arena is a first-person shooter arena in the style of sci-fi. Playing in Furry arena you can earn points, which can then be exchanged for screenshots, as well as scenes of a sexual nature

name: Battle Billiards
description: Battle Billiards is a billiards game where no one takes turns and everyone goes at the same time.

name: My Universe: Pets Edition
description:
Discover the pet collection special edition bundle! Including two “My Universe” titles – ‘Puppies & Kittens’ and ‘Pet Clinic’ with an adorable Shiba Inu Switch case!

Raise and cuddle your puppy or kitten as if they were real in My Universe: Puppies & Kittens!

Your small furry friends need you and your love to grow up and flourish. Adopt adorable puppies and kittens and take care of them as if they were real through various mini-games and activities. Pet them, feed them, play with them, take them out for a walk or teach them tricks.

Adopt a new companion!

name: Joy Flight
description: Joy Flight is an open world VR flight game where players will explore, unlock runways with daring landings and complete missions across a large chain of islands!

name: Ceaseless Night
description: Ceaseless Night is a strategic roguelike that captures the essence of dungeon crawling in a bleak world. In a world of stolen sunlight, the flickering flames of a campfire lure unwitting travelers to face the dungeons below. Conquer the dungeons, defeat the Lich King, and end this Ceaseless Night!

name: Munchkin Digital
description: Kill the monsters & grab the loot in the classic card game!

name: Hook&Loop
description: A puzzle and maze 3D game that'll stick in your heart. In this adventure, you as HookGUY has to rescue your love LoopGIRL from the clutches of cotto, a big, bad, and jealous piece of cotton. But you need to dodge all the fluffy people that live in Cottonland.

name: Grave-Queen
description: Perpetual and infinite energy used to be sought after, but now it's a reality, and it's caused problems. These problems can only be solved with some sick combos.

name: Ascend: Reborn
description: Ascend Reborn is an old-school, 3rd person action RPG. Wage war as a brutal Caos warrior on your journey to Ascension. The reign of the Titans has come to an end. The New Gods have risen to claim ultimate power and need a champion. Will you rise to the challenge?

name: Forklift Extreme: Deluxe Edition
description: An exceptional physical experience with unique visuals and super smooth, yet demanding gameplay

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel: Dawn of the Battle Royale - Let's Go! Go Rush!!
description:
Get ready to d-d-d-d-d-d-d-duel!

Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel: Saikyou Battle Royale!! is a turn-based card game set in the world of Yu-Gi-Oh! SEVENS anime that follows the "Rush Duel" rule invented by the main character Yuga Ohdo.

Enjoy an original game story that features characters from the anime. Get ready to meet familiar faces such as Yuga and Luke during your Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel: Saikyou Battle Royale!! adventure.

name: Winter Resort Simulator 2: Riedstein
description: Just in time for the start of the winter season, a DLC will be released with a new game world, frequently requested features and no less than three new ropeways.

name: Adrianne and Oliver
description: 7 days to achieve your goals. Build your relationship with characters through the choices, leading to different events and then the final outcomes. We’ll have 9 endings, 60 breathtaking sex animations, and more than 750 static images.

name: Kiss the Demiurge
description: Minori is a mage tasked with hiding magic from the world. She has spurned love in the pursuit of her mission. One day she meets a group of three girls obsessed with magic. Will she stop them from discovering real magic? Or will she fall for their charms? Find out in this dramatic girls-love story.

name: Waifu Wars
description:
In a world of love and war, there can only be one ultimate waifu. Players from all over the world compete against each other in order to prove who is the best.

You will take control of your own waifu and fight against others in order to become the ultimate champion. With many different classes to choose from, each with their own unique abilities and weapons, you will need to be strategic in order to win.

Can you lead your waifu to victory?

name: Samurai Maiden
description: A young woman from the 21st century with sharp swordsmanship skills finds herself in Honnō-ji during the Sengoku period! Together with a trio of newfound ninja friends, she races through the Underworld beneath Honnō-ji, confronted by enraged corpses at every turn!

name: Scandal Notes
description: Find glamor, glitz, gossip, and love in 1920s London! You and your friends are the talk of the town - but will a malicious journalist turn the tables?

name: Cool People Club
description: Join the Cool People Club in an epic quest to prove their coolness to the world! Dodge bullets, fight powerful foes, and determine your fate in this surreal 3D bullet hell adventure.

name: Doki Doki House
description: Doki Doki House is a dating sim that takes place in beautiful Australia on the Gold Coast. In this game you play as the heroine, which suddenly becomes the temporary owner of a guest house. Fall in love with these characters and experience the interesting story of your very own guest house!

name: Gor3
description: A mysterious castle and a mysterious artifact.

name: Romancing SaGa: Minstrel Song Remastered
description:
Romancing SaGa: Minstrel Song Remastered retains everything that made the original game great. For example, it features the unique “Glimmer” and “Combo” systems, where characters can learn awesome new abilities in the heat of battle, the beautiful illustrations, and the wonderful soundtrack by Composer Kenji Ito.

It also features the series’ Free-form Scenario System, which lets you experience the story differently depending on how you play. You choose one of eight main characters, and as you explore the vast world, your actions and decisions will weave a story that is uniquely yours.

All that already makes the game a must-play for fans of classic turn-based RPGs, but this release adds even more.

The game now features remastered high-definition graphics, new quality-of-life features that make it easier and more convenient to play, and you can even expect some new elements too!

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Hello Neighbor 2: Deluxe Edition
description: In this deluxe edition you get the game as well as three DLCs!

name: A2 Zygon
description: A bullet hell shoot-em-up that will truly challenge your skills. Gameplay oriented, retro themed, and with a spine-tingling soundtrack.

name: Moonshine Inc.
description: Become the best moonshiner there ever was, with accurate distillation methods recreated. Fermentation and distillation are simulated using exact formulas. Remember, nothing is illegal till you get caught!

name: Defect Process
description: Hack n' slash through increasingly dangerous arenas with a high action free-form combat system

name: Lying Souls
description: Lying Souls is an atmospheric, mysterious single player story horror game. You'll dive into a story in which nothing is as it seems. Find out the reasons behind what happened to your family back then. Your decisions will guide the course of the story.

name: Astra Protocol 2
description: An exploration and survival game where you captain a spaceship tasked to discover evidence of events that eradicated a populated sector of space.

name: Rank: Warmaster
description: Have you ever played a 4X game and wanted to experience more complex battles? Have you ever played an RTS and wanted meaningful exploration beyond the battle map? Have you ever played a Space Simulator and wanted more purpose than grinding for a better ship? Do you want a strategy game where your choices have consequences and defeat is always a possibility? For space game fans tired of the limited game play of singular genres we present Rank: Warmaster! With more depth than a 4X, broader exploration than an RTS, and more purpose than a Space Simulator Rank: Warmaster combines the best aspects of all three genres into a smooth blend to create a unique experience. If you've ever wished for a true multi-genre space game where you can take on any role from the commander of an empire down to the pilot of a singular ship, and to switch between them at any time, then Rank: Warmaster is the game for you!

developers.name: Laser Beams & Particle Streams Software, Inc.

name: Zombies in Space
description: A 2d, sci-fi, metroidvania style shooter coming to PC and Nintendo Switch.

name: Spirit Hunter: Death Mark II
description:
The third game in the Spirit Hunter series.

The story is set in a suburb of H City in Tokyo and revolves around Konoehara Academy, a school where gruesome events occur every ten years. The police are unable to explain the incidents, and classify them as accidents but they are rumored to be caused by spirits. Because of this, Konoehara's principal hires Kazuo Yashiki of the Kujo family to infiltrate the school as a teacher and investigate the incidents.

name: Curse of Eternity
description: A hardcore Action RPG with diverse combat and feats-based multi-classing. Start as one of three hero builds and either continue to specialize, or branch out and make your build your own. Slice, shoot, and zap your way through a dystopian world and fulfill your own deific journey.

name: Dwarven Skykeep
description: Dwarven Skykeep is a cute and humorous pixel-art card management sim in a medieval world of wizardry! Dive into the realm of Dwarves and start building the most epic tower using the power of magical cards from your deck

name: Echo
description:
"Echo" is an action role playing game.
Player will be playing as Lin, an adventurer from an independent guild.
She came to the constructed forest with a hidden ambition,
the secret inside this deserted forest will start revealing as the player progress into it.

name: End State
description:
End State is a game made by a team of turn-based tactics enthusiasts. It has (almost) everything we’ve ever wanted to experience in a game like this – a non-linear campaign, deep tactical gameplay, resource management, destructible environment and a sh*tload of different weapons. The only thing we are sparing for the future (when we have moar moneys) will be role-playing and a dynamic open ended campaign.

Turn-based strategy is a thinking man’s game. You analyze your enemy for weak spots, think your moves ahead and execute them. No matter what is happening, you’ll have the time to think about your next move. Maybe it’s because we are too old to master Counter Strike, or because we suck at quick time events, but nevertheless, we think that this is the way it should be.

End State has been under development as a hobbyist project already for a decade and has seen multiple revisions, each being more advanced and more fun than the previous one. While we are targeting a more hardcore audience, the game should still be accessible enough for anyone to learn. We sincerely hope that you’ll enjoy playing it as much as we do.

GAMEPLAY

Take command of a ragtag mercenary team with multiple characters with custom skill sets and weapons, facing a variety of enemies with different capabilities and weaknesses. Plan your moves in variable terrain that forces you to consider about character positioning. Directional facing matters and characters can peek around the corners. This is important because the “fog of war” only shows what the units actually see.

Use cover for your benefit and aim your shots at specific body parts for different results. Face varying missions with different objectives ranging from planting a tracking device to releasing hostages and the enemy AI will, of course, act according to their separate motives.

Manage your team through a non-linear campaign. Recruit mercs, equip them and upgrade their skills as they gain more experience. The campaign is not linear, and in one playthrough you’ll never see everything the game has to offer. We aim to develop a future classic you can enjoy for years to come.

name: Two Little Ghosts of that House: The Missing Toy
description: Sin descripción

name: Do You Really Want To Know?
description:
Open your social media app and start your daily life.

This is an interactive fiction jointly launched by Gamtropy and Taiwan AIDS Society (LOVE my VOICE)

Do You Really Want to Know? is a role-playing game that simulates a social media app. Overprotective parents, dysfunctional workplaces, and friends with hidden agendas - all the pressures and events could be opportunities to reexamine each other's relationships. Post updates, send messages, and make choices. Can you maintain the relationships you want if you reveal your true self?

name: Elden Ring: Dark Moon
description: An overhaul focused on new content and fashion souls, based on Elden Ring: Shattered

name: Vampire: The Regicide
description:
It is a quiet night in Krakow, and the Prince has just been murdered.

You are Mikael, a young Ventrue with no memories of his mortal life. When a power struggle in the wake of the Prince's death leaves the Sheriff and Seneschal unwilling to work together, the investigation of his murder falls to you.

Joining you is Kira, the only childe of the dead Prince Aleksander. Together, you must investigate the scene of the crime, interrogate your suspects, and bring the killer to justice before the loss of its Prince sends Krakow crumbling into chaos.

Aleksander was known as a just and beloved Prince—who could have wanted him dead? And what could have driven them to it?

name: Push Push Boom
description: Alice, the protagonist of the game, enters a different world by mistake and finds that all the delicious food she likes has become a monster that can eat people. Alice wants to avoid the monster's pursuit while she wants to defeat the monster through her own wisdom and return to her own world.

name: My Little Animal Boy
description: A sweet yoai story between humans turned into animals.

name: Gensokishi Online
description: Gensokishi Online is a fully immersive and massively multiplayer online role-playing game. It is a reimagining of the classic game Elemental Knights Online, which won the prestigious Best Game Award in Taiwan back in 2008. Gensokishi Online continues the legacy of its predecessor while incorporating modern blockchain tools and a vast Metaverse.

name: Working Noir
description:
How far will one man go to prove his innocence?

Working Title Noir Game is an action adventure game featuring a hard-boiled detective framed for murder. Play in your own style, stealth, melee, action shooter... Different styles will reveal different endings.
Sin descripción

name: Shape of Mind
description: Shape of Mind is a simple puzzle game similar to Solitaire card games. Connect shapes by dragging them on the board. Shapes of the same color won't connect. You can move strips of connected shapes by grabbing the top-most shape of a strip. Drop shapes onto the Dreamer to begin a Halo. Shapes in the Halo cannot be removed. Once a Halo is complete the shapes will disappear. Complete three Halos to clear all the shapes and win the game!

name: Blast Royale
description:
Welcome to Blast Royale!

Blast Royale is the next evolution of Battle Royale games, putting players and our community first. This is your game, your battle, and your way to play!

Players are pitted against each other in a last person standing Battle Royale survival match. A player’s inventory influences the quality of items found on the battlefield, allowing players to create custom builds to suit their own playstyle. Plan, strategise and execute to dominate the battlefield.

Uniquely, players can also fully own their own items where they can buy, sell and trade them on the Blast Royale marketplace.

name: Jewel Defender
description: Jewel Defender is an arcade action game. Fight robots from taking your jewels.

name: Highland Spirit
description:
Becky Speed is an aspiring novelist who is seeking to break her writer's block with a relaxing solo trip to the Scottish Highlands.

However, Becky is about to discover that in her idyllic cottage, she is not alone at all...

name: Marsi's Adventures
description: Marsi's Adventures is a classic single-screen 2D platformer where you have to collect three stars, overcome some obstacles and get to the final teleport.

name: Hakosan
description: This is a puzzle game where the goal is to bring three little friends to the place where they should be.

name: Dead Man's Fault
description:
A short psychological horror game about descending into a cave.
This is a short (~30 minutes) first-person psychological horror game set in a deep, dark cave.
Cave exploring is a common practice. But what happens when you overstep your boundaries? The suffocating jaws of a tight cave don't let go as easily as they grab hold of you. Deployed as part of a rescue effort, you must explore the depths of Deep Den Cave and discover what happened to the last explorer that ventured down its path. Don't get lost.

name: The Ugly Ducling
description: The Ugly Ducling is a minimalist block-based exploration and horror game, using the children's story "The Ugly Duckling" as a theme, where the player will need to find the lost pages of the protagonist's story in different biomes, while surviving.

name: Strix STG
description: "Strix STG" is a "Communication-Synchronized Bullet-Hell Casual Vertical-Scrolling Shooting-Game". Let's aim to capture all 5 stages. The best feature of this game is the ability to play two-player co-op online. A simple chat using two types of fixed phrases is prepared for role sharing.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Feldbinder Trailer Pack
description:
Feldbinder Spezialfahrzeugwerk GmbH is Europe's premier silos and liquid tankers manufacturer and a prominent trailer industry leader. We are excited to team up with them to bring you the Feldbinder Trailers Pack for Euro Truck Simulator 2.

The Feldbinder Trailers Pack DLC includes officially licensed content including 4 trailer types, 4 series variations, a wide variety of trailer and chassis sizes, and hundreds of accessory combinations!

The content of this DLC includes:

- Feldbinder EUT (Silo Trailer) with 6 body types & 3 chassis variations
- Feldbinder KIP (Silo Trailer) with 6 body types & 2 chassis variations
- Feldbinder TSA LM (Food Tanker) with 2 body types & 1 chassis variation
- Feldbinder TSA ADR (Chemical Tanker) with 4 body types & 3 chassis variation

name: TypeOut
description: This isn't your typical typing test. Unlock Powerups, create a loadout, and battle your way through prompts as fast and accurately as you can to allocate powerups and strategically attack your opponents in an effort to slow them down.

name: One Wheel Guy
description: One Wheel Guy is a fun and challenging platforming game where you control a guy on a unicycle and try to guide him to the goal at the end of each level.

name: Derision
description: A first-person horror mystery adventure game. Find a way to to avoid your captors and escape a nightmarish dungeon in an original world, and first video game, created by Anatolio, an independent developer.

name: L30-P4RD
description: L30-P4RD is Sci-Fi Top-down shooter. You explore planets as a member of the L30-P4RD, a special force that pioneered planets for civilization.

name: Mindworks: The Great Division
description: A choice-based visual novel game about science, division, and the false ideology of knowledge. Each and every one of your choices will determine whether the disciplines will end in unity or complete division. The key to eternal knowledge is in your hands.

name: Elevator Action: Returns - S-Tribute
description: Infiltrate a terrorist occupied tower, airport, and shopping mall to get classified data and stop their plans. New features have been added to this revival of the home console version of Elevator Action Returns, a masterpiece 2D action game. Also features 2 player mode.

name: One Last Time
description: Life can change in an instant, sometimes in the wrong way. After losing someone close, a mysteriously familiar person shows up to help you get your life back together. Overcome the stages of grief in this intriguing puzzle-centric, dialogue experience and see how the story unfolds.

name: Syndeo-Complex
description: In Syndeo-Complex you will explore five different environments connected by a hub. Each level has its own mechanics, weapons, enemies and bosses. The Keli, small droids, will (probably) guide you in your quest.

name: Trash Panda: The Adventures of Ricky and Boxman
description: Help Ricky Raccoon and Box Man defeat the evil Mouse King! Use box man to boost the height of your jumps, throw trash at the Mouse King's soldiers, and make it through each level as you continue your journey to save the park!

name: VR Archeology: Secrets of Kulikovo Field
description: What mysteries and keys to historical secrets are hidden underground? In this interactive VR game, you will explore the roles of modern archaeologists, restoration experts and re-enactors. Discover dozens of unique artifacts dating back to the Battle of Kulikovo on this thrilling expedition.

name: Nash Racing: Pursuit
description: You are Kevin Nash criminal whose mission is to find million dollar cash in several areas. You have limited time to find money and need avoid police cars.

name: MopGarden's Veggie Cart
description:
MopGarden’s Veggie Cart is a fast-paced, simulation game where you feed hungry bunnies lots of healthy vegetables! Can you feed them all in time?

MopGarden, a variety Twitch streamer, has decided to feed all the local bunnies in her town. As business begins to boom, she moves her veggie cart to other surrounding areas, where the vegetable orders get faster, and faster, and faster.

name: Moto Offroad Simulator
description: Moto Offroad Simulator is a racing game and is what you searched for! At the wheel of a motocross you will have to go through the mud, do stunts in the mountains and all this without putting your life in danger.

name: Mega Serval
description: Serval's friends are in danger and it's up to her to save the day! Progress through 12 action-packed platforming stages in this "Kemono Friends Project" derivative work!

name: Chinese Characters
description: "Chinese characters" is an elimination and puzzle game, put the same three words into the bottom slot to eliminate, eliminate all the words to pass the level, the game should always pay attention to the lower level of the text.

name: Hoshi no Kakera no Monogatari. Shikake-ban
description: Help a stranded girl escape with just your eyes in this puzzle game designed specifically for VR. From the stationary convergence point between the two worlds, use the "Focus Lock" to tell her the steps she has to take in order to put the star back together.

name: Retro Gadgets
description: Retro Gadgets is a gadget creation station where you invent, build, solder, code and customise your own electrifying gadgets then share them with the world.

name: Magnus Positive Phototaxis
description: Magnus Positive Phototaxis is an atmospheric journey through a mysterious world of characters, traces and symbols. The task of the player is to solve the puzzles, using proper combinations of objects, finding them in the environment around him.

name: False Skies
description: False Skies is a traditional turn-based RPG with an involved class system and a retro look. Explore a not-quite-modern world with a party of your own creation, and learn the truth behind the disappearance of a city that vanished 2000 years ago.

name: Orebody: Binder's Tale
description: Orebody: Binder’s Tale is a linear platform shooter that takes place on the alien world of Orebody. As an orphaned battle bot named Binder, players fight their way to the Floating City of Galvanstad, a hovering A.I. fortress, to confront their makers and avenge the death of their mentor.

name: Another Farm Roguelike
description: Another Farm Roguelike is a 2D farming & crafting game with rougelike elements where your job is to earn as much money as possible to pay the rent. Start from scratch and build the most profitable farm you can make as soon as possible. Work hard to be able to afford the rent.

name: Elf Girl Pinball
description: More than just a "very happy" pinball game~!

name: Lightspeed Dating
description: A cyberpunk social deduction game in which players voices are made unidentifiable. Perfectly copy your friends speech patterns, mannerisms and opinions to win in this intense experimental party game. Find out how well you really know your friends!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Imperial Edition
description:
Buy Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Imperial Edition and get:

Loyalist Pack: Purge heresy in style with these 4 unique class outfits, 8 weapon skin patterns, one set of headgear as well as an Ogryn body tattoo.
Mortis Veteran Portrait Frame: A cosmetic portrait frame used to pay tribute to the fallen defenders of Tertium Hive.
Caducades Backpack: A cosmetic backpack for human characters. Scavenged from the fallen troops of Cadia, this backpack has been repurposed to serve those still alive and fighting.
2500 Aquilas (premium currency)

name: Froggo Swing 'n Grapple
description: Froggo Swing 'n Grapple is a retro platformer game about a little frog on an adventure. Swing 'n grapple through the stages with Froggo's powerful and sticky tongue!

name: Front Mission 1st: Remake
description: Wanzers return to the battlefield once more! Prepare for battle with Front Mission 1st: Remake, a remake of the sci-fi turn-based strategy game Front Mission 1st.

name: Missile Input
description: Missile Input is an action-packed typing game where you shoot down UFOs, planes, birds and more from your missile base. Unlock special equipment and face an ever-increasing fleet of enemies. Chase the highscore or take part in an evolving storyline which is directly influenced by your actions.

name: Zold:out
description: Zold:out is a semi-turn-based tactical RPG fused with deck building. You will use multiple weapons in one turn to challenge powerful enemies in a seamless battlefield. Recruit clerks, forge weapons, and save the world with your strategy and creativity!

name: Fangs
description: Fangs is a free-to-play 4v4 Action MOBA currently in Early Access. Developed by Hidden Leaf Games, an international studio led by veteran developers from League of Legends, PUBG, VALORANT, Teamfight Tactics, and more.

name: The Whispering Valley
description: Explore a sinister village and solve complex puzzles in The Whispering Valley, a story-driven point & click game. Delve into the horror of guilt and depression to investigate the village's deepest secret.

name: Astronite
description: Astronite is a 1bit metroidvania that combines action, exploration, puzzles and platforms. Recover the planet where you and yours lived before it was invaded by strange creatures.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
description: From the developers of the best-selling and award-winning franchise Vermintide, Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is a visceral 4-player co-op action game set in the hive city of Tertium. Fight together with your friends against hordes of enemies in this new Warhammer 40,000 experience.

name: Toasterball
description:
A ball, two goals and... toasters! Welcome to Toasterball.

Play against your friends in this physics-based multiplayer sports game, where toasters are athletes, bread flies everywhere and the gameplay changes every time you score a goal!

Toasterball is a multiplayer physics-based sports game, quick to learn and perfect for good old game nights on a couch with friends (1-4 players local multiplayer). Because you are playing as toasters, you can naturally expect some chaotic physics, random situations, electrical hazard, and more burnt toasts than you can ever imagine. There is also a real learning curve, with pro moves and enough gameplay variants to keep on surprising you for hours.

name: Flock of Dogs
description: As a team of up to 8 players, ride flying dogs riding a flying whale on a road trip through the sky.

name: 22 Racing Series
description: Gran Turismo meets Wipeout, meets Starcraft, meets Monopoly? This is future vehicle technologies built upon simulated physics with track/sector capture, resource ownership, race-time vehicle upgrades, track abilities, vehicle tuning and modding - Welcome to 'Real-Time Strategy Racing' (RTS-Racing)

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Shared History
description: Shared History is a free update for Assassin's Creed: Valhalla. It follows Eivor Varinsdottir's meeting with Basim Ibn Ishaq's former mentor Roshan to combat common enemies who had joined forces against the two women.

name: Stalker: Spatial Trap
description: The game will introduce you to the story of a stalker named Zmej. The mercenary, by a strange coincidence, falls into a spatial anomaly, where other laws, a shortage of resources and total hopelessness operate. What is behind this? Will Zmej be able to find a way out of this trap? You have to figure it out.

name: I Am Not Crazy
description: After losing his daughter and wife, he became depressed and tried to kill himself many times. While she was unconscious, her head hit something hard and she went into a vegetative state. He didn't know where he was. All he wanted was to be reunited with his wife and daughter. He tried everything for her. AND... "Our character is trying to kill himself in a vegetative state."

name: Distill, My Beating Heart!
description: Sin descripción

name: Ennichi Kara Dasshutsu
description:
If you forget your true face, you won't be able to go back there. You remember your true face Before I forget everything...

Navigate your way through a summer carnival as you discover clues about who you were.

name: Gotham Knights: Heroic Assault
description: Heroic Assault is a gameplay mode that is separate from the main story campaign. The standalone mode supports up to four players in online co-op and provides a dedicated arena-like environment with specific objectives to complete and enemies to defeat on each floor (30 floors total).

name: Oubliette Fatalis
description:
In the fatal year of 226, our Sun began to fall into decline, and an eternal winter fell upon our world...
Escape your prison cell and navigate your way out of the overrun outpost. Inspired by Arkane Studio’s hit 2003 blockbuster award winning RPG title, Arx Fatalis.

name: The Mountaineer
description: The Mountaineer is a set of 5 MBF21 (-complevel 21) maps depicting a journey to the top of an uncharted mountain. A gift to MIDI connoisseur and good friend @Jimmy, commemorating his 31st birthday.

name: Marley & Marley
description: Your Future is a Horror Story Written by your Crimes! A 2021 X-mas horror short game gift from Jacob Jazz! A horrifying adaptation of Charles Dickens "Muppets A Christmas Carol" Bah! Hambug!

name: Sniper Elite 5: Conqueror Mission, Weapon and Skin Pack
description: Conqueror, the thrilling new mission for Sniper Elite 5, takes you to the town of Falaise as the retreating Nazi forces have dug in to make their last stand at the iconic castle, once occupied by William the Conqueror. You will have to use all of your stealth and skill to slip through the heavily defended Nazi lines, before breaching the castle walls to assassinate the General inside, allowing the Allies to claim victory.

name: Panzerdogs
description: Panzerdogs is an exciting online PVP tank brawler for mobile. Play solo or in a team across a variety of game modes: Team Death Match, Escort and many more to come in future updates.

name: The Knight Witch: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Liftopia: One more!
description: The big adventure of a square creature!It is a somewhat nostalgic action game drawn with dots.

name: Realm of Khaos
description: The Khaos Realm Laboratory has been taken over by the creatures from the Realm of Khaos. Shoot the enemies and kill as many as you can! Find the boss at the end... if you are willing to fight him.

name: Family Chess: Complete Edition
description: Pick your favorite Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages. Hone your skills If you want to improve on your own, tr…

name: Medusa
description: A Metroidvania about Medusa searching for a foregone creature called the Ancient Sludge. Explore eight unique regions, face hordes of menacing enemies and acquire items to help you on your adventure.

name: Iso
description: Join the robot Nem0-1 to collect photos of the animals inhabiting a post-human planet Earth filled with breathtaking sights and mysterious habitats. Complete your compendium by taking better photos, outsmart dangerous predators and explore the ruins of humanity.

name: Monster Truck Journey
description: Join this Monster Truck Journey thorough the stadium in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: The Spectator
description: The world is on the verge of collapse. The once fertile lands have become barren. The sun, once a beacon of life, has become a sign of terror. The temperature is unbearable. Living things live in constant fear and seek shelter from the scorching light.

name: Sleep
description: Nastya, she is 18 years old. Every day she draws images of the monsters that come to her and describes them. And every night, Nastya has a dream where she fights her monsters. And with each dream, you have to get out of the dream.

name: Immortal Awakening
description:
The Immortal War, between Deities and Demons, has ruined our Homeland.
Awakener, with the blessing from Human Last Shelter, will you save the world from the Grand Collapse?
